plugins.name: tmux
plugins.description: Remote control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs (python, gdb, etc.) by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation with Playwright. Claude autonomously writes and executes custom automation for testing pages, validating UX, and any browser task.
